Package org.bluezoo.gonzalez

Class NamespaceScopeTracker

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gonzalez.NamespaceScopeTracker
public class NamespaceScopeTracker extends Object
High-performance namespace scope tracker for streaming XML parsing.

This class manages namespace prefix-to-URI mappings with proper scoping for nested elements. It uses modern Java collections (HashMap, ArrayList) for better performance than the legacy SAX2 NamespaceSupport class.

Key design decisions:

  • No synchronization (single-threaded parser)
  • HashMap for O(1) prefix lookup
  • ArrayList for scope stack (typically shallow nesting)
  • Separate tracking for xmlns attributes vs. regular attributes

Per XML Namespaces 1.0:

  • Default namespace: prefix="" maps to URI
  • Unbound prefix: prefix not in scope
  • No namespace: prefix="" maps to "" (empty string)
  • XML namespace: "xml" prefix pre-bound to http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace
  • XMLNS namespace: "xmlns" prefix pre-bound to http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Constructor Details

    • NamespaceScopeTracker

      public NamespaceScopeTracker()
      Creates a new namespace scope tracker with pre-bound xml and xmlns prefixes.

  • Method Details

    • setInternPool

      public void setInternPool(org.bluezoo.gonzalez.InternedStringPool pool)
      Sets the intern pool for namespace URIs and prefixes.
      Parameters:
      pool - the intern pool (null to disable interning)

    • pushContext

      public void pushContext()
      Pushes a new namespace context (called when entering an element). Bindings declared in this context will be visible until popContext() is called.

    • popContext

      public void popContext()
      Pops the current namespace context (called when leaving an element). All bindings declared at this level are removed.

    • declarePrefix

      public boolean declarePrefix(String prefix, String uri)
      Declares a namespace prefix binding in the current scope.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the namespace prefix (empty string for default namespace)
      uri - the namespace URI (empty string to undeclare default namespace)
      Returns:
      true if this is a new binding, false if re-declaring same binding

    • getURI

      public String getURI(String prefix)
      Gets the namespace URI bound to a prefix in the current scope. In XML Namespaces 1.1, an empty URI means the prefix is unbound.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the namespace prefix (empty string for default namespace)
      Returns:
      the namespace URI, or null if prefix is not bound or was unbound (empty URI)

    • getPrefix

      public String getPrefix(String uri)
      Gets a prefix bound to a namespace URI in the current scope. If multiple prefixes are bound to the same URI, returns one arbitrarily.
      Parameters:
      uri - the namespace URI
      Returns:
      a prefix bound to the URI, or null if no binding exists

    • getPrefixes

      public Iterator<String> getPrefixes(String uri)
      Gets all prefixes bound to a namespace URI in the current scope.
      Parameters:
      uri - the namespace URI
      Returns:
      iterator over prefixes bound to the URI (may be empty)

    • getAllPrefixes

      public Iterator<String> getAllPrefixes()
      Gets all prefixes declared in the current scope.
      Returns:
      iterator over all currently bound prefixes

    • getCurrentScopeDeclarations

      public Iterator<Map.Entry<String,String>> getCurrentScopeDeclarations()
      Gets all namespace declarations made at the current scope level only. Does not include inherited bindings from outer scopes.
      Returns:
      iterator over (prefix, URI) entries for current level

    • processName

      public org.bluezoo.gonzalez.QName processName(String rawQName, boolean isAttribute, org.bluezoo.gonzalez.QNamePool pool) throws org.bluezoo.gonzalez.NamespaceException
      Processes a raw XML qualified name into namespace components.

      Returns a QName object from the pool containing:

      • uri: the namespace URI (empty string if no namespace)
      • localName: the local part of the name (after colon)
      • qName: the original qualified name (prefix:localName or just localName)
      Parameters:
      rawQName - the qualified name (may contain prefix)
      isAttribute - true if this is an attribute name (affects default namespace)
      pool - the QName pool to use for retrieving/caching QName objects
      Returns:
      QName object from the pool
      Throws:
      org.bluezoo.gonzalez.NamespaceException - if namespace well-formedness constraint is violated

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the tracker to initial state. Removes all scopes except the root scope with pre-bound xml and xmlns.
